title:
Analytical planar wavefront reconstruction and error estimates for radio
  detection of extensive air showers
authors:
Ars\`ene Ferri\`ere, Simon Prunet, Aur\'elien Benoit-L\'evy, Marion
  Guelfand, Kumiko Kotera and Mat\'ias Tueros
abstract:
When performing radio detection of ultra-high energy astroparticles, the
planar wavefront model is often used as a first step to evaluate the arrival
direction of primary particles, by adjusting the wavefront orientation based on
the peak of signal traces of individual antennas. The benefits of this approach
are however limited by the lack of a good evaluation of its robustness. In
order to mitigate this limitation, we derive in this work an analytical
solution for the arrival direction as well as the corresponding analytical
reconstruction uncertainty. Because it is fast and robust, this reconstruction
method can be used as a proxy for more complex estimators, or implemented
online for low-level triggering.
